If the assassin in your son's story is using shuriken to assassinate 
his v=
ictims, he most likely wouldn't use poison. The rust of the blades 
in that=
 time period would be enough to kill a victim. If he's using a 
blow gun or=
 something along those lines, my guess is that the poison 
would be made fr=
om some sort of plants. Blowfish poison might be a good 
guess, but I'm not=
 so sure. Hope this helps.
